scenes.visuals: Two silhouetted figures stand amidst smoke in front of a bright surface. Text at the top of the image reads 'Albert Camus "The Fall"'. Below this, the same title appears in Japanese. At the bottom, credits read: 'Conversation: NotebookLM', 'Director: Gemini 1.5 Flash', and 'Image: Stable Diffusion 3'.

A street scene in Amsterdam, where the road is wet from a recent rain, reflecting the lights of the buildings and street lamps. Above the image, text says 'Okay, so you know how sometimes you read something and it just kind of of sticks with you?' and below, the translation of this text in Japanese is displayed with the explanation of "Sticks with you".
scenes.audio: Okay, so you know how sometimes you read something and it just kind of sticks with you?

scenes.visuals: Same Amsterdam street scene as before, but with 'Mhm' at the top and "Um" at the bottom. Also on the bottom is the explanation that "Aizo" means "Aizu".
scenes.audio: Mhm.

scenes.visuals: Same Amsterdam street scene, now with 'Like you put the book down but you can't shake it.' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Like you put the book down but you can't shake it.

scenes.visuals: Same Amsterdam street scene, now with 'Absolutely' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Absolutely.

scenes.visuals: Same Amsterdam street scene, now with 'Well, listeners sent in this excerpt from Camus's The Fall, and it's like...' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "excerpt".
scenes.audio: Well, listeners sent in this excerpt from Camus's The Fall, and it's like

scenes.visuals: Same Amsterdam street scene, now with 'Oh yeah, The Fall. It's uh it's one of those books' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "The Fall" and "one of those books".
scenes.audio: Oh yeah, The Fall. It's uh it's one of those books.

scenes.visuals: Same Amsterdam street scene, now with 'It gets under your skin.' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "It gets under your skin.".
scenes.audio: It gets under your skin.

scenes.visuals: Same Amsterdam street scene, now with 'Definitely does' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Definitely does.

scenes.visuals: An image showing the interior of a dimly lit bar looking out at a rainy night scene, now with 'And the excerpt focuses on this character, Jean-Baptiste Clamence.' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "focuses on".
scenes.audio: And the excerpt focuses on this character, Jean-Baptiste Clamence.

scenes.visuals: Same bar interior shot, now with 'Clamence' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "Clamence".
scenes.audio: Clamence.

scenes.visuals: Same bar interior shot, now with 'So we're doing a deep dive into this excerpt today.' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "Deep dive".
scenes.audio: So we're doing a deep dive into this excerpt today.

scenes.visuals: Same bar interior shot, now with 'Sounds fascinating' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Sounds fascinating.

scenes.visuals: Same bar interior shot, now with 'He's in this dimly lit bar in Amsterdam, right? Rain's pouring outside.' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "dimly lit" and "pouring".
scenes.audio: He's in this dimly lit bar in Amsterdam, right? Rain's pouring outside.

scenes.visuals: Same bar interior shot, now with 'Okay, I'm picturing it.' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Okay, I'm picturing it.

scenes.visuals: Image showing a gavel laying beside a window shaped display case, now with 'And he's telling this story, but it's not just any story' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: And he's telling this story, but it's not just any story.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Right' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Right.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'It's like a confession, but also a performance' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: It's like a confession, but also a performance.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Oh, interesting' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Oh, interesting.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'And he keeps calling himself a judge-penitent.' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "judge-penitent".
scenes.audio: And he keeps calling himself a judge-penitent.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Oh, what now?' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Oh, what now?

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Judge-penitent. Yeah. It really struck me.' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Judge-penitent. Yeah. It really struck me.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'That's a That's a new one.' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: That's a That's a new one.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'It's like he's both the judge and the one being judged' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: It's like he's both the judge and the one being judged.

scenes.visuals: An image of the scales of justice, now with 'Yeah. Wow, that's uh that's Camus for you. Always messing with your head' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "messing with your head".
scenes.audio: Yeah. Wow, that's uh that's Camus for you. Always messing with your head.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Right. So, how do we even begin to unpack this whole judge-penitent thing?' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "unpack".
scenes.audio: Right. So, how do we even begin to unpack this whole judge-penitent thing?

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Well, I think it's all about this tension that Clamence embodies. You know, he's grappling with his intense guilt' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "tension", "embodies", and "grappling with".
scenes.audio: Well, I think it's all about this tension that Clamence embodies. You know, he's grappling with his intense guilt.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Yeah, he talks about this incident in his past where he failed to help someone.' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Yeah, he talks about this incident in his past where he failed to help someone.

scenes.visuals: An image showing two hands with clasped fingers, now with 'Exactly. And that's where the penitent part comes in. He's haunted by this feeling of responsibility' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "penitent" and "haunted by".
scenes.audio: Exactly. And that's where the penitent part comes in. He's haunted by this feeling of responsibility.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'But he also has this need to be in control, to be above it all' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: But he also has this need to be in control, to be above it all.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Exactly. And that's where the judge comes in. He wants to be the one who decides who's guilty, who's innocent' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Exactly. And that's where the judge comes in. He wants to be the one who decides who's guilty, who's innocent.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'It's like he's created this role where he can pass judgment on himself and others, almost like he's trying to control how he's perceived' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "pass judgment on" and "perceived".
scenes.audio: It's like he's created this role where he can pass judgment on himself and others, almost like he's trying to control how he's perceived.

scenes.visuals: An image showing a split mirror reflecting the faces of two people, now with 'Absolutely. And there's this quote that really gets at that. He says, I have to have my vengeance. I have to be the one who punishes, since I am the one who can be condemned'' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "vengeance", "punishes", and "condemned".
scenes.audio: Absolutely. And there's this quote that really gets at that. He says, I have to have my vengeance. I have to be the one who punishes, since I am the one who can be condemned.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Wow. Yeah. It's like he's saying, I'll judge myself before anyone else can.'' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Wow. Yeah. It's like he's saying, I'll judge myself before anyone else can.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Right. And that's where that unsettling laughter he keeps mentioning comes into play, I think' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "unsettling".
scenes.audio: Right. And that's where that unsettling laughter he keeps mentioning comes into play, I think.

scenes.visuals: An image of a cracked mask, now with 'The laughter' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: The laughter.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Yeah, he keeps describing this laughter that he hears at these key moments. And it's like this constant reminder of the tension within him. He knows how absurd this whole judge-penitent thing is, but he can't escape it' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "key moments" and "absurd".
scenes.audio: Yeah, he keeps describing this laughter that he hears at these key moments. And it's like this constant reminder of the tension within him. He knows how absurd this whole judge-penitent thing is, but he can't escape it.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'It's like a crack in his facade' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "facade".
scenes.audio: It's like a crack in his facade.

scenes.visuals: A split image showing a winding path through the woods, contrasted in different lighting conditions. One is dark and moody and other one is light and flowery. One has with 'Exactly' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Exactly.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Like he's trying to maintain this image of control, but the laughter betrays something deeper' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "maintain" and "betrays".
scenes.audio: Like he's trying to maintain this image of control, but the laughter betrays something deeper.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Right. And that's what makes Clamence such a compelling character. He's so aware of his own contradictions, but he can't help but play into them' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "compelling" and "contradictions".
scenes.audio: Right. And that's what makes Clamence such a compelling character. He's so aware of his own contradictions, but he can't help but play into them.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'And then there are these moments where he describes doing these good deeds, you know, helping a blind man across the street, giving up his seat on the train' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "good deeds".
scenes.audio: And then there are these moments where he describes doing these good deeds, you know, helping a blind man across the street, giving up his seat on the train.

scenes.visuals: Image showing two hands about to touch, set against a dark background with light rays. At the top, 'Yeah, but even those acts are tinged with this weird sense of superiority' is written, with Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "tinged with" and "superiority".
scenes.audio: Yeah, but even those acts are tinged with this weird sense of superiority.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Totally. He's like, Look at me being such a good person!'' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Totally. He's like, Look at me being such a good person!"

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Exactly. He even says he feels irresistible when he helps the blind man, which is such a loaded word' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "irresistible" and "loaded".
scenes.audio: Exactly. He even says he feels irresistible when he helps the blind man, which is such a loaded word.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'It's like his acts of charity are all about power and control' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "charity".
scenes.audio: It's like his acts of charity are all about power and control.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Exactly. It's not about genuine compassion, it's about feeling superior to those he's helping' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "genuine compassion".
scenes.audio: Exactly. It's not about genuine compassion, it's about feeling superior to those he's helping.

scenes.visuals: A black and white image of a microphone on a stand with spotlights shining from behind, now with 'So we've got this guy, Clamence, right? He's a judge-penitent, he's obsessed with control and judgment, and he gets off on feeling morally superior to others' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "obsessed with".
scenes.audio: So we've got this guy, Clamence, right? He's a judge-penitent, he's obsessed with control and judgment, and he gets off on feeling morally superior to others.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'And he's telling us all of this in this really deliberate way' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "deliberate".
scenes.audio: And he's telling us all of this in this really deliberate way.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Right, because it's not just what he's confessing, it's how he's confessing it. Like he even admits at one point, I cultivate my originality so as not to be devoured by the banality of our confessions'' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "cultivate", "originality", "devoured by", and "banality".
scenes.audio: Right, because it's not just what he's confessing, it's how he's confessing it. Like he even admits at one point, I cultivate my originality so as not to be devoured by the banality of our confessions.

scenes.visuals: Image showing a courthouse, now with 'Which is such a Camus line' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Which is such a Camus line.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Totally. So is he really trying to be honest or is this whole confession just another performance?' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Totally. So is he really trying to be honest or is this whole confession just another performance?

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'That's the million-dollar question, isn't it?' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "That's the million-dollar question".
scenes.audio: That's the million-dollar question, isn't it?

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'It is. Because on one hand, he's spilling his guts, holding nothing back' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "spilling his guts".
scenes.audio: It is. Because on one hand, he's spilling his guts, holding nothing back.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'But on the other hand, he's so carefully crafting the way he tells his story' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "crafting".
scenes.audio: But on the other hand, he's so carefully crafting the way he tells his story.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Like he's a lawyer presenting a case, trying to control how we see him' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Like he's a lawyer presenting a case, trying to control how we see him.

scenes.visuals: Image showing a collection of masks, now with 'Exactly. And that's where Camus really gets you thinking about the nature of confession itself.' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "nature".
scenes.audio: Exactly. And that's where Camus really gets you thinking about the nature of confession itself.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Hmm.' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Hmm.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Can any confession truly be genuine?' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "genuine".
scenes.audio: Can any confession truly be genuine?

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Or are we all just playing parts on a stage, putting on a show for each other?' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Or are we all just playing parts on a stage, putting on a show for each other?

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'It makes you wonder how much of what we present to the world, even in our most vulnerable moments, is truly authentic' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "present to the world", "vulnerable moments", and "authentic".
scenes.audio: It makes you wonder how much of what we present to the world, even in our most vulnerable moments, is truly authentic.

scenes.visuals: Image showing artwork within a church or cathedral, now with 'It's a bit unsettling when you think about it' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "unsettling".
scenes.audio: It's a bit unsettling when you think about it.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'It is, but it's also deeply human. This need to connect, to be understood, but also to control how we're perceived' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "deeply human", "connect", and "perceived".
scenes.audio: It is, but it's also deeply human. This need to connect, to be understood, but also to control how we're perceived.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'You know, there's this other detail in the excerpt that really stood out to me: the stolen panel from an altar piece' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "stood out to me" and "altar piece".
scenes.audio: You know, there's this other detail in the excerpt that really stood out to me: the stolen panel from an altar piece.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Oh yeah, the just judges?' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Oh yeah, the just judges?

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Yeah. That's the one. It seems kind of random at first, but I feel like Camus wouldn't just throw something like that in there' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "random".
scenes.audio: Yeah. That's the one. It seems kind of random at first, but I feel like Camus wouldn't just throw something like that in there.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'No way, not Camus. Every detail is so deliberate.' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: No way, not Camus. Every detail is so deliberate.

scenes.visuals: An image of the scales of justice, now with 'So what's the deal with this stolen panel? Why is it significant?' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "deal" and "significant".
scenes.audio: So what's the deal with this stolen panel? Why is it significant?

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Well, for me, it gets at this whole idea of justice, which is so central to Clamence's whole thing, you know, with the judge-penitent this' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "gets at" and "central".
scenes.audio: Well, for me, it gets at this whole idea of justice, which is so central to Clamence's whole thing, you know, with the judge-penitent this.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Right, like is true justice even possible?' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Right, like is true justice even possible?

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Exactly. And that's what this missing panel represents. It's like this void, this absence of true justice in the world' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "represents", "void", and "absence".
scenes.audio: Exactly. And that's what this missing panel represents. It's like this void, this absence of true justice in the world.

scenes.visuals: Image showing a closet with clothes inside, now with 'And the fact that it's hidden in Clamence's closet, like he's possessing this stolen justice' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: And the fact that it's hidden in Clamence's closet, like he's possessing this stolen justice.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Exactly. It's like a physical manifestation of his own internal struggle with guilt and judgment' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "manifestation" and "internal struggle".
scenes.audio: Exactly. It's like a physical manifestation of his own internal struggle with guilt and judgment.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'It's like he's trying to control justice itself by keeping it hidden away' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: It's like he's trying to control justice itself by keeping it hidden away.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Totally. And there's this line where he says, Perhaps I'm mistaken about the panel. Perhaps it's been peacefully hanging in a church for years, and it's only a reproduction I have. But what does that matter?'' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Totally. And there's this line where he says, Perhaps I'm mistaken about the panel. Perhaps it's been peacefully hanging in a church for years, and it's only a reproduction I have. But what does that matter?

scenes.visuals: An image of a maze with light in the middle, now with 'It's like he's admitting he could be wrong, but then he just brushes it off, like it doesn't even matter' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "brushes it off".
scenes.audio: It's like he's admitting he could be wrong, but then he just brushes it off, like it doesn't even matter.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'And that's what's so fascinating about Clamence. He's constantly questioning himself, doubting his own perceptions, but then he always circles back to reinforce his own narrative' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "fascinating", "constantly questioning", "perceptions", and "reinforce".
scenes.audio: And that's what's so fascinating about Clamence. He's constantly questioning himself, doubting his own perceptions, but then he always circles back to reinforce his own narrative.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'It's like he's more interested in maintaining his own version of reality than in actually confronting the truth' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "maintaining" and "confronting".
scenes.audio: It's like he's more interested in maintaining his own version of reality than in actually confronting the truth.

scenes.visuals: Image showing a statue of justice with scales of justice, now with 'Exactly. And that's what makes him such a compelling, but also frustrating character' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "frustrating".
scenes.audio: Exactly. And that's what makes him such a compelling, but also frustrating character.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Totally. So we've got this stolen panel representing this absence of true justice, and then there's Clamence with his self-imposed role as judge-penitent, trying to fill that void but also profiting from it in a way' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "self-imposed" and "profiting from".
scenes.audio: Totally. So we've got this stolen panel representing this absence of true justice, and then there's Clamence with his self-imposed role as judge-penitent, trying to fill that void but also profiting from it in a way.

scenes.visuals: Image showing a bird sitting in a bird cage, now with 'Well, this has been quite a deep dive' at the top and Japanese translation below. Also, the image contains the explanation of what is "deep dive".
scenes.audio: Well, this has been quite a deep dive.

scenes.visuals: Image of the book "The Fall" laying open, now with 'That has' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: That has.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Lots to think about' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Lots to think about.

scenes.visuals: Same image as before, now with 'Definitely.' at the top and Japanese translation below.
scenes.audio: Definitely.
